statements: UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET income = 60000, expenses = 30000, savings = 30000, credit_score = 750 WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET expenses = 25000, savings = 35000, income = 70000, credit_score = 760 WHERE user_id = 'abcdef12-abcd-abcd-abcd-abcdef123456';
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET income = 50000.00, expenses = 20000.00, savings = 30000.00, credit_score = 750 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET savings = 32000.00, credit_score = 760, income = 55000.00, expenses = 22000.00 WHERE user_id = '543e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET income = 50000.50, expenses = 25000.25, savings = 25000.25 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET savings = 15000.75, income = 45000.00, expenses = 30000.25 WHERE user_id = '98765432-5b09-464b-934e-6f44d93e172b';
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET income = 50000, expenses = 20000, savings = 30000 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET savings = 28000, expenses = 18000, income = 55000 WHERE user_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174726'
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET metric_value = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_sources SET source_type = 'Savings' WHERE source_id = 2;
UPDATE personal_finance_metrics SET metric_value = 1500.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET value = 2500.50, date = '2022-10-15' WHERE source_id = 3 AND metric_id = 4;
UPDATE users SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE budgets SET budget_amount = 5000, category = 'Groceries' WHERE budget_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE users SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE user_id = 'f04cb6ba-7775-4172-9a0d-92b246d5dcb6';
UPDATE transactions SET category = 'Groceries', transaction_amount = transaction_amount - 50 WHERE user_id = 'f04cb6ba-7775-4172-9a0d-92b246d5dcb6' AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE PersonalFinanceMetrics SET savings = 1500.50 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE InvestmentPortfolio SET amount = 2000.75, investment_type = 'Stocks' WHERE investment_id = 456
UPDATE PersonalFinanceMetrics SET income = 5000.50 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE BankTransactions SET amount = 1000.75, date = '2022-03-15' WHERE user_id = 456 AND transaction_type = 'Deposit';
